trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Maricopa
There were no other sightings in Maricopa on or around June 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the car with my father, when my he pointed out that there were two flare like objects in the sky, however in time we saw these "flares" not moving and just hovering in position, after a while one more light appeared forming the outline of a triangle. After 25 minutes the "flares" disappeared and one pulsating light and in five more minutes the light was out of our sight. This triangle hovered in place the entire time, we were awed by the sighting of this and we lost sight of the object once we got into the residential area of maricopa.
Summary: Four lights apeared in the sky one pulsating, all others blinking randomly
